name: Syberia 3
description: The next generation in adventure games, Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters, you'll discover and experience a fabulous tale as imagined by Benoit Sokal.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ 64bit Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R7 260X - Nvidia GTX 550 Ti 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 45 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 45 GB available space Sound Card: Any
